<<<<<<< HEAD
A vindication of the Presbyterians in Scotland, from the malicious aspersions cast upon them in a late pamphlet, written by Sir George Mackenzie late Lord Advocate there, intituled, A vindication of the government in Scotland during the reign of King Charles II, &c. by a lover of truth. Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.
[2], 30 p.
Printed for Edward Golding, London : 1692.
Wing attributes to Gilbert Rule. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.
[2], 30 p.
Printed for Edward Golding, London : 1692.
Wing attributes to Gilbert Rule. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Edward Golding
